creator: Daniel Salinas
descriptionHtml:
Create and manage deck lists for the Arkham Horror LCG card game. You can also use the digital campaign log to group decks and track changes scenario by scenario.

Works with both locally saved decks or by linking your ArkhamDB account to sync changes with the website.

• Edit and upgrade your investigator's decks, either offline or by linking your ArkhamDB account.
• Track your Arkham Horror scenario results and keep the campaign log up to date.
• Keep track of investigator trauma and assign new random basic weaknesses as you take on new madnesses.
• Log the chaos bag as it changes, letting you have multiple campaigns going at once as you wait for the next month's mythos pack.
• Draw tokens using the built in digital chaos bag, and use the built in odds calculator to compute the odds of success before you do.
• Use the advanced card search to find cards by trait, health, shroud or keyword.

Arkham Cards is not affiliated or endorsed by Arkham Horror: The Card Game, (c) 2016 Fantasy Flight Games.
descriptionShort: Arkham Horror LCG Deck Builder and Campaign Log

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• Fix for crash related to side scenarios in NOTZ and RTNOTZ campaigns.
• The odds calculator now stays up to date with your campaign log.
• Adjust how some of the changes that happen 'during' a play scenario occur, to avoid confusion and try to keep the campaigns on track. If you have a TCU campaign you might need to revisit Union and Disillusion to complete an additional question.

Create and manage deck lists for the Arkham Horror LCG card game. You can also use the digital campaign log to group decks and track changes scenario by scenario.

Works with both locally saved decks or by linking your ArkhamDB account to sync changes with the website.

• Edit and upgrade your investigator's decks, either offline or by linking your ArkhamDB account.
• Track your Arkham Horror scenario results and keep the campaign log up to date.
• Keep track of investigator trauma and assign new random basic weaknesses as you take on new madnesses.
• Log the chaos bag as it changes, letting you have multiple campaigns going at once as you wait for the next month's mythos pack.
• Draw tokens using the built in digital chaos bag, and use the built in odds calculator to compute the odds of success before you do.
• Use the advanced card search to find cards by trait, health, shroud or keyword.

Arkham Cards is not affiliated or endorsed by Arkham Horror: The Card Game, (c) 2016 Fantasy Flight Games.
descriptionShort: Arkham Horror LCG Deck Builder and Campaign Log

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
• Add guided campaign for The Innsmouth Conspiracy deluxe expansion.
• Add german translations for The Innsmouth Conspiracy and Return to the Forgotten Age campaigns.
• Minor bug fixes and improvements.

- Add new in app release notes feature to highlight recent features.
- Make Lily's Disciplines and Parallel Roland's Directives easier to add to decks.
- Improve pull to refresh behavior throughout the app.
- This update adds better support for fan-made player cards, which can now be enabled on the settings tab.

title: Arkham Cards

creator: Daniel Salinas
descriptionHtml:
Create and manage deck lists for the Arkham Horror LCG card game. You can also use the digital campaign log to group decks and track changes scenario by scenario.

Works with both locally saved decks or by linking your ArkhamDB account to sync changes with the website.

• Edit and upgrade your investigator's decks, either offline or by linking your ArkhamDB account.
• Track your Arkham Horror scenario results and keep the campaign log up to date.
• Keep track of investigator trauma and assign new random basic weaknesses as you take on new madnesses.
• Log the chaos bag as it changes, letting you have multiple campaigns going at once as you wait for the next month's mythos pack.
• Draw tokens using the built in digital chaos bag, and use the built in odds calculator to compute the odds of success before you do.
• Use the advanced card search to find cards by trait, health, shroud or keyword.

Arkham Cards is not affiliated or endorsed by Arkham Horror: The Card Game, (c) 2016 Fantasy Flight Games.
descriptionShort: Arkham Horror LCG Deck Builder and Campaign Log

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Add support for building decks via drafting.
- Fix deck building rules for Lily and Parallel Roland.

Create and manage deck lists for the Arkham Horror LCG card game. You can also use the digital campaign log to group decks and track changes scenario by scenario.

Works with both locally saved decks or by linking your ArkhamDB account to sync changes with the website.

• Edit and upgrade your investigator's decks, either offline or by linking your ArkhamDB account.
• Track your Arkham Horror scenario results and keep the campaign log up to date.
• Keep track of investigator trauma and assign new random basic weaknesses as you take on new madnesses.
• Log the chaos bag as it changes, letting you have multiple campaigns going at once as you wait for the next month's mythos pack.
• Draw tokens using the built in digital chaos bag, and use the built in odds calculator to compute the odds of success before you do.
• Use the advanced card search to find cards by trait, health, shroud or keyword.

Arkham Cards is not affiliated or endorsed by Arkham Horror: The Card Game, (c) 2016 Fantasy Flight Games.
descriptionShort: Arkham Horror LCG Deck Builder and Campaign Log

appDetails.recentChangesHtml:
- Fix an Epilogue in the Dream-Eaters campaign.
- Bug fixes for the audio system.
- Fix location layout issues during scenario setup on some larger maps.
- Correct a corner case where cards wouldn't load when editing decks.
- Correct some issues related to preview investigators (Carson + Amina)

- Fix issue where taboo button showed up everywhere.
- Some improvements to the audio system.

title: Arkham Cards

creator: Daniel Salinas
descriptionHtml:
Create and manage deck lists for the Arkham Horror LCG card game. You can also use the digital campaign log to group decks and track changes scenario by scenario.

Works with both locally saved decks or by linking your ArkhamDB account to sync changes with the website.

• Edit and upgrade your investigator's decks, either offline or by linking your ArkhamDB account.
• Track your Arkham Horror scenario results and keep the campaign log up to date.
• Keep track of investigator trauma and assign new random basic weaknesses as you take on new madnesses.
• Log the chaos bag as it changes, letting you have multiple campaigns going at once as you wait for the next month's mythos pack.
• Draw tokens using the built in digital chaos bag, and use the built in odds calculator to compute the odds of success before you do.
• Use the advanced card search to find cards by trait, health, shroud or keyword.

Arkham Cards is not affiliated or endorsed by Arkham Horror: The Card Game, (c) 2016 Fantasy Flight Games.
descriptionShort: Arkham Horror LCG Deck Builder and Campaign Log
